text: O ahlole lipakeng tsa bona ka se senotsoeng ke Allah, u se latele litakatso tsa bona, empa u be hlokolosi ka bona e se re mohlomong ba u khelosa likarolong tse ling tseo Allah a li senotseng ho uena. Haeba ba u koenehela, tseba hore thato ea Allah ke hoba otla malebana le libe tse ling tsa bona. Ruri! Boholobabatho ke baetsa-libe
